## ArcTanNode class

Computes the arctangent (inverse tangent) function

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class ArcTanNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns atan(x) in radians for input x. Result is in the range \[-π/2, π/2\]. Supports scalar and vector inputs (component-wise for vectors).
